attributes.action: Petition for referendum on Green policies
attributes.additional_details: We demand that the Parliament gives the electorate a democratic choice via a national referendum, to establish a mandate if one exist, with a promise to carry out their wishes.
attributes.background: Every policy concerning the drive to reduce carbon has been brought in without the consent of the people. Every policy, promise & piece of legislation has a negative impact on the lives of the British people, making their lives smaller, colder & hungrier.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign: 

'Hold a referendum on achieving net zero goals.'
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701342
